thread.title: Trump demands border action as 'caravan' approaches U.S.

title: Trump demands border action as 'caravan' approaches U.S.
text:
Trump demands border action as 'caravan' approaches U.S.   01:11 
As a so-called ''refugee caravan'' makes its way from Central America to the United States, President Donald Trump renewed his calls Monday for Congress to act on immigration, urging lawmakers in a tweet to ''use the nuclear option if necessary.'' Colette Luke reports.   
As a so-called "refugee caravan" makes its way from Central America to the United States, President Donald Trump renewed his calls Monday for Congress to act on immigration, urging lawmakers in a tweet to "use the nuclear option if necessary." Colette Luke reports.  //reut.rs/2H9G2y8
